definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Buy the pass on a message of sina to Microsoft general, the expert inside course of study expresses generally open-eyed .
sentences.chinese: 對微軟將收購新浪的傳言，業內專家普遍表示驚訝。

sentences.english: The week began with forecasts of huge public-sector job losses.
sentences.chinese: 這個禮拜一開始就有傳言，說要大量裁員。

sentences.english: He said he hoped rumours that Brown would quit would come true.
sentences.chinese: 他希望布朗因爲身體原因提前辭職的傳言成真。

sentences.english: Rumour has it that he is positioning himself to take over from Mr Papandreou.
sentences.chinese: 有傳言稱這是因爲他要取代潘帕德里歐的位子。

sentences.english: Could all that talk of the Golden Company sailing west have been a feint?
sentences.chinese: 那些關於黃金團向西起航的傳言難道是聲東擊西？

sentences.english: We can, of course, dismiss such nonsense as superstition.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們可以拋開這些傳言，全當它是迷信之說。

sentences.english: The report has yet to be confirmed, though rumors that Young has passed a physical for United have also surfaced.
sentences.chinese: 交易尚待確認，儘管有傳言稱揚已經去曼聯體檢了。

sentences.english: His arrival in the capital scotched reports that he was dead.
sentences.chinese: 他抵達首都一事止住了說他已死的傳言。

sentences.english: But don't let the myths hold you back.
sentences.chinese: 但是不要讓不真實的傳言綁住你的想法。

sentences.english: I remember anecdotally something very silly.
sentences.chinese: 我記得有傳言稱一些非常愚蠢的。

sentences.english: You have just well confessed yourself that you do not believe in the rumors of sodomy.
sentences.chinese: 你剛纔已經自己充分承認你不相信男色的傳言。

sentences.english: The latest pictures of her confirmed these rumors.
sentences.chinese: 她的近照證實了這些傳言。

sentences.english: S. dollars. The acquisition rumors and speculation, Pfizer and Amgen declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 對於收購的傳言和猜測，輝瑞和安進拒絕評論。

sentences.english: This is where the myth of half-orc stupidity becomes glaringly incorrect.
sentences.chinese: 由此，認定半獸人愚笨的傳言顯然是謬誤。

sentences.english: There is talk of the failed deal presaging a break-up.
sentences.chinese: 對於交易失敗的就預示着解散的說法不過是傳言。

sentences.english: When I was in school we didn't really have proms in the U.
sentences.chinese: 他覺得學校舞會沒有傳言中那麼好。

definition: to declare to be untrue/to deny
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to listen/to hear what sb says/news one has heard
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
